<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/products/{productNo}/url-shortening"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



## 부가설명 및 특이사항
            
상품번호와 쇼핑몰 번호에 해당하는 단축URL 조회하는 API입니다

 ### OAUTH2 참고사항
* [Oauth2 API](https://docs.shopby.co.kr/?url.primaryName=auth/#/OAUTH2/post-oauth2-token) 를 사용하여 토큰을 발급받은 경우,
* 기존 accessToken 대신 Shop-By-Authorization 로 액세스 토큰을 전달해야합니다.
* ex) Shop-By-Authorization : Bearer test-access-token


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"productNo","in":"path","description":"상품번호","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"101963333"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"200","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","description":"단축URL","example":"http://alpha-firstmall.e-ncp.com/s/abCdEfg"}},"description":"","title":"products-productNo-url-shortening-1808461975"},"examples":{"get-products-url-shortening":{"value":"{\"url\":\"http://alpha-firstmall.e-ncp.com/s/abCdEfg\"}"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
